prompts: Create a cute fairy-type Pokemon that sparkles like a star.
I want a round, pink Pokemon with big ears and a cheerful expression.
Generate a playful Pokemon that loves to dance under the moonlight.
Make a whimsical creature with soft, fluffy features and a magical aura.

Design a charming Pokemon that thrives in lush forests and grassy fields.
